definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: I hope to recapture those two lost years of my life.
sentences.chinese: 我希望补回我那两年失去的时光。

sentences.english: No participants shall claim back any trial jump or throw.
sentences.chinese: 参赛者不得要求补回失去的试跳或试掷机会。

sentences.english: No athletes shall claim back any trial jump or throw.
sentences.chinese: 运动员不得要求补回失去的试跳或试掷机会。

definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
to bring up to full strength/to make up a deficiency/to fill (a vacancy, gap etc)
to make up for what is lacking/to fill (a vacancy)/to replenish
to complement/to make up for a deficiency
to pay in advance/to get payment in advance
to exhaust/to use up/to deplete/to drain
